response.overview: A mercenary with a three-bladed sword rediscovers his royal heritage when he is recruited to help a princess foil a brutal tyrant and a powerful sorcerer's plans to conquer the land.
response.tagline: A kingdom ruled by evil. A princess enslaved by passion. A warrior driven by justice.
response.title: The Sword and the Sorcerer
